channel.title: Jail explantion of codes?

item.title: Jail explantion of codes?
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

Currently trying too move my jail.

ive moved the tele spot, rocks/ people ect. just a few things left, main one being the walls. these walls dont allow people too follow into the jail or out of the jail. this is what makes deltas jail so good. i came across this code

public boolean isInJail() {
if((absX >= 2928 && absX <= 2943 && absY >= 3275 && absY <=3291))
return true;
else
return false;
}
public boolean isInJail2() {
if((absX >= 2926 && absX <= 2938 && absY >= 3274 && absY <=3292))
return true;
else
return false;

can someone explain that too me ?

and is that what makes the walls so you cant walk through them, if it isnt where can i find this code?

thanks.

Read full topic
